com.algolia.search.saas

Interface SyncListener


  • public interface SyncListener

    Listener for sync-related events.

    Notifications are sent on a per-index basis, but you may register the same listener for all indices. Notifications are sent on the main thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void syncDidFinish(MirroredIndex index, java.lang.Throwable error, MirroredIndex.SyncStats stats)
      Synchronization has just finished.
      void syncDidStart(MirroredIndex index)
      Synchronization has just started.

    • Method Detail

      • syncDidStart

        void syncDidStart(MirroredIndex index)

        Synchronization has just started.

        Parameters:

      • syncDidFinish

        void syncDidFinish(MirroredIndex index,
                   java.lang.Throwable error,
                   MirroredIndex.SyncStats stats)

        Synchronization has just finished.

        Parameters:
        index - The synchronizing index.
        error - Null if success, otherwise indicates the error.
        stats - Statistics about the sync.
